textBeforeTable: Shoulders and sleeves fit snugly. You may wish to order one or two sizes up depending on desired fit. Garment Measurements: Handmade in and fairly traded from India Handwash cold, no bleach, iron low, no tumble dry Double layer of material 90% bamboo, 10% polysatin So luxurious they threw in a second layer of ultra-soft bamboo fiber...who knew eco-friendly could feel and look so exquisite? Soft as a whisper, our silky sweater marries gentle luxury with environmentally responsible cachet. The seductive drape adds the spirit of romance to your wardrobe, while the open cut lets you highlight whatever you're wearing beneath.
